import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const JobListCardSub = ({ post }) => { const handleDelete = async () => { try { await axios.delete(`/posts/${post._id}`, { data: { username: user.username }, }); window.location.replace("/"); } catch (err) { } }; return (
Job ID Role Company Location Experience View Edit Delete
{post.jid} {post.role} {post.company} {post.location} {post.experience}
) } export default JobListCardSub
